mapper.select: select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.TRUENAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.TITLE like '%${value}%' and IMPORT_TYPE=1 ${where} order by t.IMPORT_ID desc

select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.TRUENAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime,t.CREATOR CreatorId from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.IMPORT_ID=#{value} order by t.IMPORT_ID desc

select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.TRUENAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.TITLE like '%${value}%' and IMPORT_TYPE=2 ${where} order by t.IMPORT_ID desc
mapper.delete: with v as ( select i.PERSON_ID from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA i where i.IMPORT_ID=#{value} group by i.PERSON_ID ) select p.PAY_TITLE S1,STRING_AGG(e.PERSON_NAME, ',') S2,count(1) D1 from HR_SALARY_PAY p inner join HR_SALARY_PAY_OBJECT po on po.PAY_ID=p.PAY_ID inner join v on v.PERSON_ID=po.PERSON_ID inner join HR_EMPLOYEE e on v.PERSON_ID=e.PERSON_ID where p.PAY_MONTH= (select convert(date, max(i.pay_month)+'01') from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA i where i.IMPORT_ID=#{value} ) group by p.PAY_TITLE
mapper.select: select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,t.TITLE Title,u.USERNAME CreatorName,CONVERT(varchar,t.CREATE_TIME,120) CreateTime from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR t left join T_S_USER u on t.CREATOR=u.USERID where t.TITLE = #{value}

select t.IMPORT_ID ImportId,e.PERSON_NAME PersonName,e.CARD_ID CardId,t.PAY_MONTH PayMonth,t.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME ItemName,t.ITEM_VALUE PersonPayValue,ITEM_CMP_VALUE CompanyPayValue, BASE_VALUE BaseValue,SCALE_PERSON ScalePerson,SCALE_CMP ScaleCompany,PAY_INDEX PayIndex,ACCOUNT_INDEX AccountIndex,MEMO,t.ITEM_ID ItemID from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t left join HR_EMPLOYEE e on t.PERSON_ID=e.PERSON_ID where t.IMPORT_ID=#{value}

select e.PERSON_NAME 姓名,e.CARD_ID 身份证,t.PAY_MONTH 缴存日期,t.IMPORT_COLUMN_NAME 险种,t.ITEM_VALUE 个人部分,ITEM_CMP_VALUE 单位部分, BASE_VALUE 缴费基数,SCALE_PERSON 个人缴费比例,SCALE_CMP 单位缴费比例,MEMO 备注 from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t left join HR_EMPLOYEE e on t.PERSON_ID=e.PERSON_ID where t.IMPORT_ID=#{value}
select t.PERSON_ID PersonId,t.ITEM_ID ItemId,ITEM_VALUE PersonPayValue from HR_SALARY_IMPORTOR_DATA t where t.PAY_MONTH=convert(char(6) ,GETDATE() , 112)
